group_1.textCenter: It's finally here... Oooh, it's so cold!
Um...okay, first I need to check the cash@registers...
There, a self-checkout one!
Thank goodness, I can do my shopping all@by myself here.
Now, let's see, where's the chocolate? Ah!
Gosh, there's so many kinds! I can't pick...
I need 4 presents. What kinds should I get?
Milk chocolate, dark chocolate, chocolate@with peanuts or almonds, truffles...
Chocolate with macadamia nuts...and...@what's this? Gee...Gianduja?
Praline...ganache?
I don't know half of these words. My@head's spinning...
Hmmm...
Oh, this one is pretty big.
It's a big box with ten kinds of chocolate@truffles inside...
Each one is a different color and shape, so@it looks really fun and cute...
Just like all the people at Mikazuki Villa.
I'll buy this one, and we can all share it.
Yeah, that sounds good! Now to take it to @the cash register...
Oh my goodness!!!
"Mr. Purrs-a-lot" chocolate! And it's@right next to the register!
[chara:100450:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's toooooo cute!
A special Valentine's Day design...@So Mr. Purrs-a-lot is...
[chara:100450:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]He's hugging a heart! That's too cute!
You could use the box to keep stuff in@after you finish eating the chocolate too!
It's for kids, so it's cheap...and I already@came all this way, so...
I guess I could treat myself...

group_1.textRight: Please scan the items you wish to purchase.

group_1.textCenter: Okay, here's the barcode! Scan!
And scan!
Next I have to...press this button to start@paying...
Okay then...

group_1.textRight: Your purchase is complete. Thank you@for shopping with us!

group_1.textCenter: I did it!
I managed to buy it just fine.

Chocolates for everybody...and some chocolate@for myself...[chara:100450:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100450:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:100450:cheek_1][chara:100450:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100450:lipSynch_1]hee hee.
I always have to rely on Iroha and the@others to do anything...
But little by little...
I want to start doing all kinds of things@on my own, as much as I can...
[chara:100450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
What's going on with that man across the@road? Something seems wrong...
Wait, I feel something... A Witch's@Labyrinth?
It's really faint...
That mark on his neck...
That isn't...is it? A Witch's Kiss?!
